content: Yes, Kirstie Alley joined the cast of Cheers in season 6 after Shelley Long left the show. She played the character Rebecca Howe, who was initially hired as the manager of Cheers by Sam Malone. Kirstie Alley's performance was well-received by audiences and critics, and she went on to become a significant part of the show's cast for the next six seasons. In fact, she won an Emmy Award for her role in 1991.
